org.apache.flink.runtime.util

类 ClassLoaderUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.util.ClassLoaderUtil

  • public final class ClassLoaderUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Utilities for information with respect to class loaders, specifically class loaders for the dynamic loading of user defined classes.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      限定符 构造器和说明

      Private constructor to prevent instantiation.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getUserCodeClassLoaderInfo

        public static java.lang.String getUserCodeClassLoaderInfo(java.lang.ClassLoader loader)
        Gets information about URL class loaders. The returned info string contains all URLs of the class loader. For file URLs, it contains in addition whether the referenced file exists, is a valid JAR file, or is a directory.

        NOTE: This method makes a best effort to provide information about the classloader, and never throws an exception.

        参数:
        loader - The classloader to get the info string for.
        返回:
        The classloader information string.

      • validateClassLoadable

        public static boolean validateClassLoadable(java.lang.ClassNotFoundException cnfe,
                                            java.lang.ClassLoader cl)
        Checks, whether the class that was not found in the given exception, can be resolved through the given class loader.
        参数:
        cnfe - The ClassNotFoundException that defines the name of the class.
        cl - The class loader to use for the class resolution.
        返回:
        True, if the class can be resolved with the given class loader, false if not.
